item.title: Getting It Right: A Beginner's Guide to Medical Image Classification Do's and Don'ts
item.description: A hands-on tutorial designed specifically for beginners in medical image classification, covering essential do’s and don’ts for successful projects.

item.title: Introduction to deep learning
item.description: An advanced graduate course covering state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms, with emphasis on deep learning architectures, optimization techniques, and real-world applications in computer vision and natural language processing.
